General.Name: Bohai Ferry Co Ltd
General.Description: Bohai Ferry Group Co., Ltd. engages in water transportation business in China. It is also involved in the ticketing, cruise travel, ship leasing, cargo roll transportation, and finance lease businesses. The company was formerly known as Shandong Bohai Ferry Co., Ltd. Bohai Ferry Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Yantai, China.
